text:
e="preserve">The Bruck an der Mur District is a former district in the state of Styria in Austria. Bruck an der Mur merged with the district of Mürzzuschlag to form the new district of Bruck-Mürzzuschlag on 1 January 2013.
Municipalities.
Suburbs, hamlets and other subdivisions of a municipality are indicated in small characters.
